---
category: news
title: "Analyze in Excel Workbooks are now saved to OneDrive for Business"
excerpt: "When users click Analyze in Excel in the Power BI service, the generated Excel workbook is automatically saved to OneDrive for Business and the workbook can be directly opened in a web browser using Excel for the web."
